#summary Estructura de formularios GeoBloc

= GeoBloc XML Forms DTD =

You can download it from http://ull-etsii-geobloc.googlecode.com/files/GeoBlocFormsDTD.dtd

{{{

<!-- Elements -->
<!ELEMENT gb_form (gb_name, gb_version, gb_date, gb_formDescription, gb_page+)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_name (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_version (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_date (gb_dateDay, gb_dateMonth, gb_dateYear)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_dateDay (#PCDATA)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_dateMonth (#PCDATA)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_dateYear (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_formDescription (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_page (gb_pageName,(gb_label|gb_button|gb_field|gb_list)+)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_pageName (#PCDATA)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_label (gb_description?, gb_labelText)>
            <!ELEMENT gb_description (#PCDATA)>
            <!ELEMENT gb_labelText (#PCDATA)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_button (gb_description?, gb_buttonText)>
            <!-- <gb_description> -->
            <!ELEMENT gb_buttonText (#PCDATA)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_field (gb_description?, gb_fieldLabel, gb_fieldDefaultValue?)>
            <!-- <gb_description> -->
            <!ELEMENT gb_fieldLabel (#PCDATA)>
            <!ELEMENT gb_fieldDefaultValue (#PCDATA)>
        <!ELEMENT gb_list (gb_description?, gb_listLabel, gb_listItem+)>
            <!-- <gb_description> -->
            <!ELEMENT gb_listLabel (#PCDATA)>
            <!ELEMENT gb_listItem (gb_listItemLabel, gb_listItemValue)>
                <!ELEMENT gb_listItemLabel (#PCDATA)>
                <!ELEMENT gb_listItemValue (#PCDATA)>

<!-- Attributes -->
<!ATTLIST gb_label
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_button
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    action (map|gps|photo|video|audio) #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_field
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    isRequired (true|false) "false"
    type (string|integer|float) #REQUIRED
    linesNumber CDATA "1"
>

<!ATTLIST gb_list
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    isRequired (true|false) "false"
    type (single|multiple|combo) #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_multipleChoiceList
  isRequired (true|false) "false"
>

<!ATTLIST gb_listItem
    selected (true|false) "false"
>

}}}

=== Example 1 ===

A simple one page form example

{{{

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE gb_form SYSTEM "http://ull-etsii-geobloc.googlecode.com/files/GeoBlocFormsDTD.dtd">

<gb_form>
  <gb_name>Form example 1</gb_name>
  <gb_version>1.0</gb_version>
  <gb_date>
    <gb_dateDay>28</gb_dateDay>
    <gb_dateMonth>1</gb_dateMonth>
    <gb_dateYear>2010</gb_dateYear>
  </gb_date>
  <gb_formDescription>This is a form example, written using the GeoBloc Desktop aplication.</gb_formDescription>
  <gb_page>
    <gb_pageName>Page 1</gb_pageName>
    <gb_label id="lab01">
      <gb_labelText>User autentification</gb_labelText>
    </gb_label>
    <gb_field id="field01" type="string" linesNumber="1" isRequired="true">
      <gb_fieldLabel>Name</gb_fieldLabel>
    </gb_field>
    <gb_field id="field02" type="string" linesNumber="1" isRequired="true">
      <gb_fieldLabel>Surname</gb_fieldLabel>
    </gb_field>
    <gb_list id="list01" type="combo" isRequired="false">
      <gb_listLabel>Gender</gb_listLabel>
      <gb_listItem>
        <gb_listItemLabel>Male</gb_listItemLabel>
        <gb_listItemValue>M</gb_listItemValue>
      </gb_listItem>
      <gb_listItem>
        <gb_listItemLabel>Female</gb_listItemLabel>
        <gb_listItemValue>F</gb_listItemValue>
      </gb_listItem>
      <gb_listItem>
        <gb_listItemLabel>Unknown</gb_listItemLabel>
        <gb_listItemValue>U</gb_listItemValue>
      </gb_listItem>
    </gb_list>
  </gb_page>
</gb_form>

}}}
